mapper.update:
update flight_num
flight_num = #{flightNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
compay = #{compay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cteate_date = #{cteateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exp1 = #{exp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp2 = #{exp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

end_hour=#{endHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_place=#{startPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_place=#{endPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flight_num set flight_num = #{flightNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, compay = #{compay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cteate_date = #{cteateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exp1 = #{exp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp2 = #{exp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
